I may be a little late to the party, but I love this game. I bought it for the Gmod textures, but setting up a server and playing 5v5s with friends could never be more fun.
Never solo queue, after being banned for 1 day because my internet was shit, I was later banned by 4 french twats for not being french.... 7 day ban, never solo queue,,,
Classic first person shooter. Doesn't get any simpler than this. The fact that there are still servers for it almost 20 years later says something...
